channel.title: Run_map.bat
channel.description: does anyone know what the "run_map.bat" is all about in the RSCD. I have tried several different sauses and it doesn't seem to run. Any idea what it is or how to run it?

item.title: Run_map.bat
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:4, topic:328783”][quote author=roflcopterofl link=topic=425176.msg3122612#msg3122612 date=1265677745]

just outputs a land overview with bad coloring

do you how i can make it work?

Thanks ;D
[/quote]

its simple you make it work like when you run a server, if everything is right in build,xml you wont have problems[/quote]

Giant error:

map:
